ABOUT.LEAD: During my training as an application developer, I became fascinated by how complex problems can be solved elegantly through code. After studying Applied Computer Science at FH Bingen, I was able to deepen this passion in a wide variety of projects – from 3D simulations to modern web applications. Today, I work as a Senior Software Developer and Architect with a focus on Java, Angular, and DevOps. Thanks for stopping by!
ABOUT.ROLE: Senior Software Developer / Full-Stack Developer / Software Architect

HIGHLIGHTS.P1: Architecture and implementation of database connectivity using Hibernate 6.x.
HIGHLIGHTS.P2: Design and development of a full-stack web application for collision analysis (Angular + Spring Boot + Docker).
